title: K8ssandra First Touch
description:
In this live demo, Aleks Volochnev shows you how to run an Apache Cassandra© cluster in Kubernetes using K8ssandra. Steps include: installing a cluster using Helm, configuring ingress using Traefik, checking that the installation is running correctly, explanation of each pod included in K8ssandra, viewing metrics using Prometheus and Grafana,  and running repairs with Reaper. You can try installing yourself using the getting started guide at https://k8ssandra.io/docs/getting-started

MORE ON K8SSANDRA
Website: https://k8ssandra.io
Twitter: https://twitter.com/k8ssandra

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX DEVELOPERS
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
